11050000.text:
[Recommended Level] 53
People of the Ivory Gale seem to think that I have had some kind of grand adventure and gained a lot of experience. I think it's a little exaggerated. I understand why they got that impression, though...

But, the younger members want to hear stories of the outside world and listen to my advice? I'll have to come up with something I can tell them when we meet... and I might be able to learn something, too.

I'll meet the members and listen to what they have to say.

11050001.text:
[Recommended Level] 60
There's a strange person here. Maybe they're looking for trouble?

Judging by what they're wearing, they could be an Ivory Gale member... What's going on?

11050002.text:
[Recommended Level] 60
So, we meet again. There's something fishy about what he says, but it seems to be true that the local residents are suffering.

I'll follow Jimmy Ace and head to the Giant Night Gargoyle. He's probably waiting for me.

11050003.text:
[Recommended Level] 51
I met the Baron Pioneers again in Haewol. They seem to be looking for a certain place, yet again... I should hear them out and give them a hand as an honorary Baron Pioneer.

First, let me go to Specter Hill and chase the Daybreak away. If they need anything else, they'll ask.

11050004.text:
[Recommended Level] 55
I met a person who'll talk about Song Sigook. It seems to be a sensitive story that is difficult to talk about in the branch, so I think it's best to go somewhere more private and listen to the story.

The most secluded place is probably the Caelite Ruin. There's no reason for people to go there...

But first, I need to eliminate the nearby Hollows to make it a bit more comfortable to talk.

11050005.text:
[Recommended Level] 51
Ivory Gale's Yu Muson is not skilled at martial arts, but he's interested in weapons. I'm not a specialist in gear, but I can help him get weapons.

All I have to do is get rid of the Hoglins and collect their weapons.

11050006.text:
[Recommended Level] 52
Yohan of the Peach Blossom is arguing with a colleague over what is a scorpion's best weapon. Why is he asking me to reason with the colleague when I can see they're standing right next to each other?

Anyway, I'll hear his colleague out first. I'm sure they have some strong opinions about scorpions...

11050007.text:
[Recommended Level] 54
An Ivory Gale member with a loud voice and laugh is asking for help. Gray Mandaravas appeared in the Lumber Camp and are interfering with the work.

They are not only annoyingly loud, but they're also dangerous.
Let me think after getting rid of the Mandaravas.

11050008.text:
[Recommended Level] 54
Han Soye of the Ivory Gale can't leave the branch because she's afraid of the Gray Darkhorns. I don't know why she's so scared, but...

Maybe eliminating the Gray Darkhorns will help? I should get rid of them.

11050009.text:
[Recommended Level] 55
Jinhee of the Peach Blossom is having a conversation with her colleague over what the Ratmen's strongest attribute is. I think they're going to have a useless argument again, but...

Just in case, let's talk to Yohan. Maybe this conversation will actually be meaningful this time.

11050100.text:
[Recommended Level] 56
I met a scholar who was wondering aloud why jellyfish live in the forest. As soon as I heard his question about the forest jellyfish, I couldn't help but become curious. I'll follow the scholar to the Dreamy Forest.

11050101.text:
[Recommended Level] 56
The scholar said there was some research that he wanted to perform, but it was too dangerous. Maybe this is his chance to research it now that I can protect him from danger.

He's venturing deeper into the Dreamy Forest... It seems it's even riskier in there. I'd better be prepared. Then, shall we follow him?

11050102.text:
[Recommended Level] 57
A Sol Seekers member asked the geologist to leave, saying it's too dangerous. Why doesn't he just get out of this place? He insists on staying because he's researching?

He's so worked up that I don't think we'll be able to have a conversation. I think it would be better to ask the Sol Seekers member about the situation.

11050103.text:
[Recommended Level] 58
The scholar's demeanor suddenly became serious, and they asked for help. So, a few geologists who used to do research here disappeared? This was a kidnapping? It certainly seems too perilous for a scholar to go alone.

Dragonhead Cape... There must be a lot of dangerous enemies there... I should head that way. If there are any enemies, I should eliminate them and look for the missing people.

11050104.text:
[Recommended Level] 58
The geologists seem to be infected with a disease. Looks like Won Tozi is trying to develop a cure to help his colleagues...

I don't know if I can be of any help, but I'll follow him. There are Blue Bandits around here, so I can at least get rid of them.

11050105.text:
[Recommended Level] 56
A terrified researcher claims that he must go to the research site no matter what. It seems dangerous... Can he really deliver the package to the Research Camp on his own?

First, I'll eliminate the nearby Mutants. Then, I'll follow the researcher and see if he gets to the Research Camp safely.

11050106.text:
[Recommended Level] 56
A merchant from the Soul Steel has a stomachache. Why even try to eat a mushroom without knowing if it's poisonous...?

I'm gonna have to look into this mysterious fungi. They said it was a mushroom from a Gnarlox. First, I'll get some of them. They'll come in handy later.

11050200.text:
[recommended level]>50 
Passing the red slope, I met Chae-ran, a new member of the Myunghye team on a mission to investigate a heterogeneous race. It is said that she approached the Hongdon tribe for coverage, but lost all data and managed to escape. If I had heard such a question, it would have made me angry...

Let's help Chae-ran recover the stolen materials.

11050201.text:
[Recommended level]>51
Muk-cheol Kwon, the father-in-law of the Pungbaekmun Haewol branch, said that he couldn't get a job when he saw his son always playing alone. .. This guy is obsessed with detective games, right?

I have a feeling it's going to be a tough day.

11050202.text:
[Recommended Level]>52
The dungeon discovered by Little Detective Kwon Doi, I didn't think it was a facility that could be found under Poongbaekmun, but it must have been a place built by the Black Dawn. He calmly told the truth about the dungeon called Chibu. He didn't remove it to forget the mistakes of the past, but he also added that he couldn't leave it as it was until he found out that children were coming and going.

Closing the dungeon. Shall I add a little more power to it?

11050203.text:
[Recommended Level]>55 
A huge fertility mining incident in the early days of the pioneering of the sea and moon continent. 
The old man was the one who lost all his colleagues and his subordinates in the tragedy of that day. But they all failed, and now they are trying to find a peaceful death for them. 

I can't stop walking when I see the tired old man. Let's help the old man get some rest.

11050204.text:
[recommended level]>56
I met Maparam, a wildlife conservation group hiding behind a fence and observing the behavior of the swarms. He is said to have reached the Seawol Continent by tracing deer antlers illegally distributed in Suwol Plain. .

Let's kill the Bullfights so he can rescue the deer!

11050205.text:
[recommended level]>56
I met a young teacher Lingling, who was wandering alone in the forest of Samyojeong. Lingling said that she was looking for a precious herb used to treat heat stroke. It looks so frightened that it's hard to even find a herb... 

Let's help Lingling find the herb.

11050206.text:
[Recommended Level]>59 
At the Dragon Head Exploration Area, I met a young couple sitting helplessly, pretending to be beggars. They said that they had lost everything except the clothes they wore to the spear gang on their honeymoon where they should be happy.
 
Let's get the newlyweds' gold bags, gifts, and suitcases back from the Changdodan.

11050207.text:
[recommended level]>needs to be displayed
Fill in the Abyss Rift guide quest description here!!!!

11051200.text:
[recommended level]>50 
Chaeran, a new rookie hye gang hiding behind a rock on a red slope and watching the Hongdon people. Seeing her restless and helpless, something must have happened!

Let's talk to Chaeran n and hear what's going on.

11051201.text:
[recommended level]>51
Muk-cheol Kwon, the father-in-law of the Pungbaekmun Haewol branch, says that his son is always playing alone and he cannot get a job. If it is enough to play with him for a while, I can help enough. I think...

11051202.text:
[Recommended Level]>52
The dungeon discovered by Little Detective Kwon Doi is very reluctant. No matter how you look at it, it's not a facility that is likely to be located in the basement of Pungbaekmun... Let's ask someone who knows more.

11051203.text:
[RECOMMENDED LEVEL]>55 
I found a weary old man and a young foster team guarding him around a barrier overlooking huge fertility. He is pulling the bowstring.

What the hell is the story? Let's talk with the young crew.

11051204.text:
[Recommended level]>56
I met Maparam, a wildlife conservation group that hid behind a fence and monitored the movement of the swarms. He is said to have reached the Seawol Continent by tracing deer antlers illegally distributed in the Suwol Plains. .

It's a very sad story to just ignore...
